Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista™ CTNI Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™ CTNI SDIL Sample Diluent
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista™ CTNI Flex reagent cartridge, calibrator, and sample diluent for quantitative measurement of cardiac troponin I using chemiluminescent immunoassay on the Dimension Vista™ System.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of cardiac troponin I in human serum to aid in the diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction and risk stratification of acute coronary syndrome patients; calibrator for assay calibration; diluent for sample dilution.
